column5: A friend is going to Pine Falls, and wants directions to Pro-Am tackle in Winnipeg. I've been there,and am sure I could get back there myself, but can't remember the roads to take, etc. well enough to explain to him. Any help appreciated.Any better reports from Pine Falls?

Pro-Am is in Stranscona on Regent.Lagamodiare,<Spelling?Where the two streets meet.Fishing hole is just down from there also past wall-Mart same side of street.ALmost across from Canadian Tire.FISH ON.
I believe that Regent is also Nairn on west side of highway 59 which is the highway you continue on to Pine Falls. Lagimidier (sp?) I think becomes 59 as you leave Winnipeg.

Well, assuming you can find Lagimodiere (59) which runs North/South. Travelling north through the city on Lagimodiere, you will eventually reach the intersection of Lagimodiere and Regent/Nairn, it's just north of a fairly big train track overpass. If you turn left(west) you are on Nairn, and right(east) for Regent. Pro-Am is on the north side of Nairn in a small strip mall not far from the intersection. The fishin hole is in a strip mall on the south side of Regent, a little further away from the intersection. It's hard to see the store, so you have to look for the sign.
Turn left just before Perkins which is on the left side of the 59.
Pro am tackle is on north side of nairn in stip mall across from Wendys hamburger joint
